actions.name: White Smoke

cost.trigger: A negative stage effect is applied to the user

actions.description:
Trigger: A negative stage effect is applied to the user
Effect: Connection - Smokescreen. The user freely uses Smokescreen with the blast centered on themselves. Then, the triggering effect is cured. Smokescreen Hazards created by the user do not affect the user or their allies.

system.description:
Trigger: A negative stage effect is applied to the user
Effect: Connection - Smokescreen. The user freely uses Smokescreen with the blast centered on themselves. Then, the triggering effect is cured. Smokescreen Hazards created by the user do not affect the user or their allies.
